text: This is a list of moths of the family Tortricidae that are found in South Africa. It also acts as an index to the species articles and forms part of the full List of moths of South Africa. *Acanthoclita phaulomorpha (Meyrick, 1927) *Acleris rubi Razowski, 2005 *Afroploce karsholti
